sentences.en: And karst diaspore bauxite deposits belong to bioorganic sedimentary deposits.
sentences.cn: 又我国硬水铝石岩溶铝土矿,应属于生物有机质成矿作用的沉积型铝土矿.

sentences.en: Collapse is a typical geologic disaster in karst area.
sentences.cn: 岩溶塌陷是岩溶发育地区所特有的灾害地质现象.

sentences.en: Evolution of 3 paradigms in modern karst study is reviewed.
sentences.cn: 回顾了近代岩溶学三种“范式”的更替历史.

sentences.en: Gexianshan carbonate allochthon is rich in various karst features.
sentences.cn: 塘坝子葛仙山碳酸盐岩外来体中各种岩溶形态十分丰富.

sentences.en: Hydrogeological chemistry reflects certain geology environment where karst water has developed.
sentences.cn: 水化学成份反映了岩溶水形成的一定地质环境.

sentences.en: Karst cave if found any is filled up or contained with water.
sentences.cn: 在业已发现的卡斯特溶洞中均充满或含有水.

sentences.en: Karst dynamic system is an important part in earth surface system.
sentences.cn: 岩溶动力系统是地球表层系统的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Karst ecosystem is an ecosystem controlled by karst environment.
sentences.cn: 岩溶生态系统是受岩溶环境制约的生态系统.

sentences.en: Landscape mainly consists of water karst topography and the two broad categories.
sentences.cn: 境内地貌主要分流水地貌和岩溶地貌两大类.

sentences.en: Soil is the most scarce and non - regenerated resource in Karst area.
sentences.cn: 土壤是岩溶地区不易再生的最稀缺资源.

sentences.en: The karst fissure medium can be regarded as dual medium of porosity.
sentences.cn: 岩溶裂隙介质可视为双重孔隙度介质.

sentences.en: The technique has been proved to beof importance in karst water exploration.
sentences.cn: 证实该项技术在岩溶水水文地质勘察中具有重要作用.

sentences.en: The types of ground collapse in Guangzhou include karst collapsecollapse.
sentences.cn: 地面塌陷是珠江三角洲城市地质灾害的主要类型之一.

sentences.en: There are karst caves in Guilin.
This characterization was one of mechanism of Karst adaptability of Orychophragmus violaceus.
sentences.cn: 这种能力是诸葛菜的喀斯特适生性的机制之一.

phrases.tran_cn: 岩溶地形；岩溶地势；喀斯特地形

trans.tran_cn: 石灰岩地区常见的地形，喀斯特
trans.tran_en: denoting the characteristic scenery of a limestone region, including underground streams, gorges, etc
